attributes.action: Rename the title Prime Minister to Acting Prime Minister when a change in this office takes place other than at a general election.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition is to create a new name for a person attaining the position of Prime Minister outside that of a general election. This new name would be "Acting Prime Minister" and would encourage the person/party to go to the country as soon as possible to be able to remove the word "Acting" from the title.
